name: BulletSponge (PROTOTYPE)
description:
Prepare to take some punches!

This is a small prototype for a game inspired by the modern DOOM series. Except instead of getting resources by performing Glory Kills you gain them by getting shot!

As this is a simple prototype the game is far from amazing but should at least work well as a proof of concept for the general inspiration.

Development will continue in the meantime to expand on player movement and weapons as well as improving the simple AI and adding sound effects to provide more feedback to the player

Available on Windows OS

Prototype developed using Unreal Engine

Packages used during development (All available for free on Unreal Store):

FX Variety Pack by Kakky

Industry Props Pack 6 by SilverTim

Paragon: Wraith by EpicGames
